subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard had 18 points and 10 rebounds last night to lead the host Orlando Magic to a 97-68 victory over the Heat, which lost its second straight game without Dwyane Wade, the most valuable player of the N.B.A. finals last season.
